title: Men's Muscle V Neck Polo Shirts Slim Fit Short Long Sleeve Cotton Golf T-Shirts Ribbed Knit Soft Tees
description: Men's Polo Shirt-95% cotton and 5% spandex ribbed knit material. The fabric is ultra stretchable, breathable, and skin-friendly. The soft material will suit daily wear or business and bring you a casual look.

Muscle Shirts Design-This short sleeve polo T-shirt has a unique v-neck instead of the design of traditional buttons, solid color t-shirts will always look mature and steady, you could easily match clothing for any casual occasion, such as sports, work, vacation, etc.
Unique Design-Ribbed knit material is more breathable than common material, the premium cotton fabric keeps this garment from pilling. If you have strong muscles, the polo shirt will fit well.
Garment Care-Machine wash is applicable, but hand washes with cold water will be better. Hang to dry or dry at a low temperature.

BRAND GNVVIWL-Our mission is to satisfy every customer. Please rest assured that our products will always maintain high quality. If you are not satisfied, please contact us immediately and we will give you the best solution.
